meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room and Videoconference, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, TX 75201

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the Board President.

agenda_items.title: Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Attendance check by the Assistant General Manager.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the minutes from previous meetings.

agenda_items.title: Ethics Disclosures
agenda_items.description: Disclosure of any relationships by Board members with projects on the agenda.

agenda_items.title: Security and Fencing Discussion
agenda_items.description: Discussion regarding security and fencing for a specific property.

agenda_items.title: DPFC Board Appointment Procedures
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on appointment procedures and governance.

agenda_items.title: Property Monitoring Procedures
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on monitoring procedures for DPFC-owned properties.

agenda_items.title: 2024 DPFC Annual Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion and review of the annual report.

agenda_items.title: DPFC Website Briefing
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion regarding the DPFC website.

agenda_items.title: Staff Hiring Committee Report
agenda_items.description: Monthly report from the Staff Hiring Committee.

agenda_items.title: DPFC Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on the pipeline report.
